documents.document: @stormchas4 yeah.. I deleted it. Hard to say for sure I guess.
@pozole I deleted it will wait for other confirmation if there is
@stormchas4 even for him it's kind of hard to believe. but the business tycoon world doesn't do diplomacy like gov.
@srmullens CC covers many things of course, but the chorus from CC folks has been a bit myopic. not his primary duty for one.
@majackmom certainy possible he's more pro oil than many would like but that's a small aspect of job.
@majackmom not sure I'm that bothere by the Russia ties.. think the award stuff was blown out of proportion at least.
@shawnmilrad maybe they'll get a divorce.. we need more excitement!
@shawnmilrad yeah that is a risk. but still.. the few folks who are actually worthy are a plus.
Tillerson will probably be a good Secretary of State. Which will undoubtedly really piss off the one-issue people.
@philliefan_99 I dunno. Also the tax day march. So I guess possibly three weekends in a row..
So the scientist march is a week before the climate march? Know why but should be more spaced out.
Speculative Twitter is the only Twitter.
@JustinFleenor imagined radio traffic in my head. :p
@davecwarren I dunno. It might blunt it. There is fortunately a lot to be outraged about. But I'm still not sold this generation is cut out.
@Questsnow which school?
The whale is loose.
Draft notice to Iran: "Hey guys, us launching war against you would be ridiculously poor judgment. Thanks."
@pammiekate @davecwarren want to choose battles that can be won. this is a long road.. people are going to get tired.
@amosmagliocco yeah it does. for now staying fired up is good. but gotta choose wisely.. it's going to be tiring.
This explanation is getting old. https://t.co/AQcIHm4QTw https://t.co/843x8IMGN1
@amosmagliocco Gorsuch or Trump? I'd hope so on the latter. :p
@amosmagliocco also yes. what a mess they are. bleh.
@amosmagliocco either way it seems it would be worth saving the extreme for the next one.
@amosmagliocco yep. although it would be nice if they could come to some sort of deal about the next one.. although the GOP is on a high.
@amosmagliocco yeah. I mean I'd have hoped for a centrist but that was a pipe dream based on what we've seen so far.
@amosmagliocco US politics is not my thing so I may be offbase. I am just assuming he will get through one way or another.
The comments. Sensibility has no place in #merica, y'all. https://t.co/875x37Vn3g

@angelafritz yes. I think you were OK since that day wasn't over yet.
Today's my 11th anniversary of arriving in the swamp.
@Kat_Cr yeah pretty much on all counts. save the extreme option for something else later.. especially if it might not work anyway.
@WxDeFlitch yeah.. can't not come out there. :p wish it could be all spring.
@chris624wx heh yeah was thinking about that too.. going to Ft Lauderdale that day. could be bumpy.
@AaronWxDavis yeah maybe. he just seems driven by too many extreme forces. but yes this pick isn't terrible IMO. odd quote tho.
@WxDeFlitch would be pretty early for that area but not impossible. can't wait.. need distraction. few more weeks..
@Kat_Cr yeah--don't agree with everything I've heard but he seems like a good choice for what he is. but everyone likes to fight.

@davecwarren I can see it from a 'momentum' angle but it's going to be a long and tiring fight.

@alilmascara well I was also thinking potential for another SC choice under Trump. That could be the one they have to go nuclear.
That's a beaut. #lolgfs #predawnfebwedges https://t.co/ie0Q5f6gAY
@whatisthisrds I hope. If Trump ends up successful it changes the whole dynamic I'm sure. Knew this nom would help there too.
@epicciuto @paulythegun yeah sessions should not be AG. bleh. If they can't come to their senses on DeVos who knows what they can on.
@paulythegun yeah there are all sorts of things to consider...
@jimmyc42 that could be it. I mean there is some "positive" for keeping the #resistance stuff going strong.. but otherwise.. bleh.
@paulythegun I guess.. this is not my area at all. Seems if they have to go big it would be better to wait for the next one.
@whatisthisrds in theory. the republicans don't seem very honorable these days as a whole.
@paulythegun yeah that's true.
@shawnmilrad throwing oneself on a sword is admirable if it accomplishes something. this seems it would not.
The last thing we need is a different story about everything bothering Pelosi.
Dems need to play more long game. Value in shutting down Gorsuch same value that made Hillary president. Other battles to be fought.
@FonHom @RyanMaue @paulythegun I mean the dems. It doesn't change the old makeup.. there might be another SC battle in the future.
@RyanMaue @paulythegun no doubt that assumption on Hillary didn't help. My hot take is they should probably focus on other battles.
@paulythegun I never really understood why Obama didn't just force it. or was there absolutely no way?
@donkeydownburst he makes a great useful idiot. vomit inducing.
Seems the prez and the religious right came to some sort of blood deal. Politics eh.
@mracton I will not be watching.
